record.field: sql="""SELECT sum(debit) as sum_debit, sum(credit) as sum_credit, sum(debit-credit) as balance, am.id as move_id, am.state, am.period_id FROM account_move am, account_move_line ml WHERE ml.move_id = am.id AND ml.state = 'valid' GROUP BY am.name, am.id, am.state, am.period_id HAVING abs(sum(ml.debit-ml.credit)) <> 0""" cr.execute(sql) result = cr.dictfetchall()
